ComicInfo.Title: Evolution; Don Coyote; Tale of Cain; Gambling Fever; The Story of the Witch/The Hand Behind the Head
ComicInfo.Summary:
Evolution: A scientist steps into an evolution machine and is transformed into a superhuman being from the future. He travels further and further - until he turns into primeval protoplasm.
Don Coyote: Don Coyote is looking into an unsolved murder case. Accompanied by his handiman, Sancho Pinza, they ride into a western town and suspect the sheriff. They are run out of town and the unhappy Don is killed by Sancho, who was the murderer all along.
Tale of Cain: A mean-spirited man infects his brother with evil thoughts. The brother retaliates by killing the man. He will perish as well, because the men were siamese twins.
Gambling Fever: Larry Duquette develops a gambling addiction and loses his money, his job and his marriage.
The Story of the Witch/The Hand Behind the Head: Accounts of witches and magicians.
